messages.content: I got a gift for my brother in law, it's an animal flow course with GMB Fitness. I want to make a present graphic that references moving like an animal and says merry christmas, maybe all animals with christmas elements moving dynamically with a gift feeling? Can you come up with a good idea and make a graphic? it's one way i can make a digital gift something i can wrap and put under the tree make it so there’s is some buffer around the image so the text isn’t clipped add his name Pierre Olivier and make a sloth sheepishly on the top of the Christmas tree. You can add a single ninja turtle hidden small somewhere too for fun lots of other animals dynamically moving lions tigers bears etc

{'content_type': 'image_asset_pointer', 'asset_pointer': 'file-service://file-S9hnU5u5dF7VdkjXEzbjPw', 'size_bytes': 504882, 'width': 1024, 'height': 1024, 'fovea': 512, 'metadata': {'dalle': {'gen_id': 'Eq625jJxiixcOUld', 'prompt': "A vibrant Christmas-themed graphic featuring a dynamic scene of various animals in motion, showcasing the essence of an animal flow fitness course. A sloth is sheepishly perched on top of a decorated Christmas tree, wearing a Santa hat. Around the tree, lions, tigers, and bears are dynamically moving, with festive elements like candy canes, snowflakes, and Christmas lights enhancing the scene. The text 'Merry Christmas Pierre Olivier' is prominently displayed with some buffer space to avoid clipping. A small, hidden ninja turtle is subtly placed in the corner, adding a fun touch. The overall design has a warm and playful gift-giving feel.", 'seed': 2929315612, 'parent_gen_id': None, 'edit_op': None, 'serialization_title': 'DALL-E generation metadata'}, 'gizmo': None, 'generation': None, 'container_pixel_height': None, 'container_pixel_width': None, 'emu_omit_glimpse_image': None, 'emu_patches_override': None, 'lpe_keep_patch_ijhw': None, 'sanitized': False, 'asset_pointer_link': None, 'watermarked_asset_pointer': None}}

Here is the graphic designed as per your instructions. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or additional elements added!

Here’s the final design featuring one bear, one lion, and one tiger, all dynamically posed and festive, with the glowing sloth at the top of the tree and a small, hidden ninja turtle for a playful touch. Let me know if it’s perfect or if there’s anything else you’d like to tweak! More paddington style
